text: The men's discus throw event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 16 and 17 September. A 2kg (senior implement) discus was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Brian Milne ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Frits ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 21 athletes from 17 countries participated in the event. ==References== Discus throw Category:Discus throw at the World Athletics U20 Championships
